data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Savanne with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Savanne, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 68,600 people living in Savanne, Mauritius. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Savanne.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,669 believers in Savanne, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 6,669 believers in the state of Savanne into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Savanne, Mauritius to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Savanne, Mauritius.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
